title: VMware security advisory (AV26-162)
description: On February 24, 2026, VMware published a security advisory to address vulnerabilities in the following products:
products: VMware Cloud Foundation  versions prior to 9.0.2.0
VMware vSphere Foundation  versions prior to 9.0.2.0
VMware Aria Operations  versions prior to 8.18.6
solution: Review the references and apply the necessary updates.
